bioconda.name: pash
bioconda.summary: A versatile software package for read mapping and integrative analysis of genomic and epigenomic variation using massively parallel DNA sequencing

biocontainers.name: pash
biocontainers.summary: A versatile software package for read mapping and integrative analysis

biotools.summary: Pash 3.0 performs sequence comparison and read mapping and can be employed as a module within diverse configurable analysis pipelines, including ChIP-seq and methylome mapping by whole-genome bisulfite sequencing

bioschemas.name: PASH
bioschemas.summary: Pash 3.0 performs sequence comparison and read mapping and can be employed as a module within diverse configurable analysis pipelines, including ChIP-seq and methylome mapping by whole-genome bisulfite sequencing
